fileDef.fileContent:
#!/bin/bash

mkdir proximityFiles
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles

run.description:
##help

Usage: hotspot3d calroi [options]

REQUIRED  
--output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

--help                       this message

## usage

example command

hotspot3d calroi --output-dir=./
run.label: calroi

#!/bin/bash

mkdir proximityFiles

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
\n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles'

run.description:

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/annotationFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pvalues \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.proximity_file.path+' proximityFiles/pvalues \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.ProximityFile_annotationFiles.path+' proximityFiles/annotationFiles'

run.description:
##help

Usage: hotspot3d anno [options]

        --output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

        --help                       this message
## usage

## example command
run.label: anno

fileContent.script:
'#!/bin/bash \n\
\n\
mkdir proximityFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/inProgress \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/pdbCoordinateFiles \n\
mkdir proximityFiles/annotationFiles \n\
mkdir humanPeptides \n\
cp '+$job.inputs.ensembl_peptide_database.path+' humanPeptides'

run.description:
##help

     Usage: hotspot3d trans [options]

     REQUIRED
     --output-dir                 Output directory of proximity files

     OPTIONAL
     --blat                       Installation of blat to use (defaults to your system default)

     --help                       this message
run.label: trans

label: hotspot3d_prep
description:
## Preprocessing

7 required, 1 optional, 8 total

         drugport  --  0) Parse drugport database (OPTIONAL)
         uppro     --  1) Update proximity files
         calroi    --  2) Generate region of interest (ROI) information
         statis    --  3) Calculate p_values for pairs of mutations
         anno      --  4) Add region of interest (ROI) annotation
         trans     --  5) Add transcript annotation
         cosmic    --  6) Add COSMIC annotation to proximity file
         prior     --  7) Prioritization

##Analysis

4 required, 2 optional, 6 total
       

         search    --  0) 3D mutation proximity searching
         post      --  1) Post-processing of 3D proximity searching output
         cluster   --  2) Determine mutation-mutation and mutation-drug clusters
         sigclus   --  3) Determine significance of clusters (BETA/OPTIONAL)
         summary   --  4) Summarize clusters (OPTIONAL)
         visual    --  5) Visualization of 3D proximity (OPTIONAL)
